#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
long long MOD=1000000007;
ll power(ll a, ll p)
{
    if(p == 0)
    {
        return 1;
    }
 
    int half = p/2;
 
    ll res = power(a, half);
    res = (res*res) % MOD;
    if((p & 1) > 0)
    {
        res = (res*a)%MOD;
    }
    return res;
}
 
long long C(long long n, long long r)
{
    long long f[n + 1];
    f[0]=1;
    for (long long i=1;i<=n;i++)
        f[i]=(i*f[i-1]%MOD)%MOD;
   return (f[n]*((power(f[r],MOD-2) * power(f[n-r],MOD-2)) % MOD)) % MOD;;
}
 
int main()
{
    long long n,x;
    
  s(n);
  x=n+1;
  n = C(2*n,n)%MOD;
  n = (n%MOD * power(x,MOD-2)%MOD)%MOD;
  
 
  printf("%lld\n",n%MOD);
  
  return 0;
}
